We at Satya Invisible Grills offers Invisible Safety Grills in Chennai, Hyderabad and Bangalore
Contact us
Previous slide
Next slide

+91-9940592321

Free Installation & Free Inspection

We offer absolute Installation Free for Invisible Grills Chennai for all types of requirements. We provide best quality Invisible Grills in Chennai at low Cost.Get Free Quote for Invisible Grills Today.

Free 24x7 Support& Free Inspection

Offering the most effective maintenance for all kind of Invisible Grills Installed By Us. We do take care of replacement or repairing of Invisible Grills in Chennai.

About Us

Satya Invisible Grills

Satya Invisible Grills is one of the top Invisible Grill manufacturers in Chennai, Hyderabad and Bangalore which we are manufacturing the products including Invisible Grills, Stainless Invisible Grill, SS Balcony Invisible Grill, Invisible Grill for Modern Homes, Aluminum Grills, Window Grill, and Rooftop. With its ideal combination of safety and style, homeowners are starting to embrace the idea of the invisible grill.

The increasing number of people living in apartment buildings has highlighted how crucial balcony safety is, particularly for households with small children and pets. But the beauty of your home shouldn’t have to be sacrificed for safety.

Contact us

Our Services

Invisible Grills

Elevate your balcony with Satya Invisible Grills, combining safety and aesthetics seamlessly. Our innovative design ensures a secure barrier without obstructing views, offering a stylish solution for modern living spaces.

Call Now Or
Read More

BIRD SPIKES ​

Satya Invisible Grills also offers Pigeon & Bird Spikes designed to deter birds from roosting or nesting on buildings. These humane and effective solutions are easy to install, ensuring a bird-free environment. Contact Satya Invisible Grills Today.

Call Now Or
Read More

BIRD PROTECTION NETS ​​

There is major problem of pigeons in many areas now a days. They get easy access from open plumbing ducts & find good nesting area on the pipes & parapets inside the duct. They make nests & lay eggs if there is no bird protection nets.

Call Now Or
Read More

UN COMPROMISED VIEW

With thickness of 3 mm at every 50 mm, the invisible grille allows you to enjoy the mesmerizing view of city, seashore, valley, etc from your balcony, provides excellent ventilation and lets the mother nature flow freely into your dream home.

HARD LINE SAFETY

With gap of just 50mm it provides you and your loved ones ultimate safety by not allowing even an infant to go bypass. Unlike traditional grilles, the invisible grille comes with nylon coating which prevents children from getting hurt.

METICULOUS DESIGN

It is so well crafted that it creates the “Aww factor” instantly to anyone who comes across, at the same time provides the much needed safety.

EASY MAINTENANCE

Made of 316G Stainless steel and coated with nylon, the invisible grille is Non rustable and Non corrosive. Unlike traditional grilles it wont eat your free time in cleaning and dusting the grille, as it wont allows the dust to settle.

Why Choose Us ?

Satya Invisible Grills dedication to quality and exceptional service has made us Bengalurian’s
preferred window furnishing provider over the past 5 years.

Exceptional service and top-notch quality! Satya Invisible Grill not only enhances security but also adds a modern touch to our space.
Ramesh
Satya Invisible Grill exceeded our expectations. The sleek design blends seamlessly, providing security without obstructing the beautiful views. Highly recommended!
Manasa Raj
Safety meets aesthetics with Satya Invisible Grill. The transparency is impressive, making our home feel secure without compromising the open feel.
Raju K
